name: Ritual (itch) (Elias Saarenpää)
description:
You have made a deal with the devil and now he is out to collect your soul. But fear not, for you have found a way to trap the demon... a ritual. But the ritual needs a sacrifice, a sacrifice of blood.

Pick up the dimensional ritual knife in order to travel between our world and hell, fill the altars with the blood of the tormented and trap the devil for all eternity!

Controls

  • "W" - Move forward
  • "A" - Rotate left
  • "D" - Rotate right
  • "M1" - Attack
  • "H" - Travel between dimensions (using the ritual knife)
  • "2" - Use key

This game was made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023 by a group of friends:

  • Casper - Programming & Game Design
  • Miko - Programming & Game Design
  • Mariel - Art
  • Anssi - Game Design
  • Elias (me) - Art & Game Design
